fields.name: Beginner's Guide to Quilting
fields.author: Elizabeth Betts
fields.description:
Learn how to make beautiful quilts with this comprehensive guide to patchwork and quilting for beginners. Covers all aspects of quilting from piecing and applique to quilting and binding. Choose from 16 simple projects, each focusing on a different technique, from bags and cushions to table mats, wall hangings and bed quilts.

Clear illustrations and step-by-step instructions accompany each project, making them all suitable for even a complete novice. The book also includes a quilting glossary explaining common quilting and sewing terms.

fields.name: The Quilter's Bible
fields.author: Linda Clements
fields.description:
This book presents essential know-how—together with a wide range of inspirational projects, tips, and ideas collected from international top-name quilters. Ideal for both beginners looking for trustworthy advice in a single volume and committed quilters searching for authoritative reference on seldom-used techniques, it features over fifteen projects including cot quilts, bed quilts, lap quilts, bags, cushions, wall hangings, table mats, runners, and other beautiful projects for the home.
 
Includes colour photos and illustrations.

fields.name: Jelly Roll Inspirations
fields.author: Pam Lintott
fields.description: Jelly Roll Challenge offers twelve brand new practical quilt projects to satisfy every Jelly Roll addict. Alongside the winning entries, every quilt has been recreated by the author, ensuring absolute accuracy and providing you with an alternative colour variation. Each design comes with a full colour styled photograph, comprehensive instructions and complete diagrams. Plus, each quilt requires one Jelly Roll and additional background fabric, making all of the projects quick, inexpensive and fun.

fields.name: Quilt As-You-Go Made Modern
fields.author: Jera Brandvig
fields.description:
Introduce yourself to an easy quilt-as-you-go technique that’s creative and expressive. With this method, instead of dealing with precise paper patterns and cutting measurements, fabric gets pieced directly onto small manageable batting blocks. The blocks can then be quilted (not the entire quilt!), whether in large abstract zigzags or small structured stitches. After the blocks have been joined, simply add backing fabric and binding and - voilà - it’s finished!

A modern approach to quilting that’s fresh, fun, and simpler than it sounds.
Great for moms or anyone with a busy schedule―it’s easy to bring these 13 projects along, so you can pick up where you left off.
Go your own way: This method can be used with a pattern or intuitively improvised, creating a wide variety of design options.
Save money! Learn how to finish quilts without the use of a longarm professional.
Quilt As-You-Go Made Vintage, the follow-up book by Jera Brandvig, is now available.

fields.name: Quilt As-You-Go Made Vintage
fields.author: Jera Brandvig
fields.description:
A follow-up to the bestselling Quilt As-You-Go Made Modern by Jera Brandvig.

Jera is back, this time with a romantic take on her quilt-as-you-go designs. Try your hand at 9 projects, including an elegant sampler with 51 mix-and-match blocks. For quilt as-you-go enthusiasts, Jera shares three optional joining methods, including her technique that makes your quilt reversible! No matter how busy your schedule, you can set attainable goals and practice quilting patchwork blocks in small, manageable pieces.

fields.name: Orange and Blue Ocean Wave Quilt
fields.description: Vibrant vintage quilt in a much-desired pattern, with tiny triangle piecing and lovely scrappy colours. The quilt is constructed in the Ocean Wave pattern, with a beautiful mix of late 19th century fabrics, indigo blues, chrome yellow, and 1930s dress prints. The triangles measure 1" x 1.25" and are hand pieced. The setting is a melon orange ground with tiny purple print. It has double bar line quilting across the entire quilt in white thread. Backing is white muslin, and it is bound back to front and hand finished. Lightweight cotton batting. 75" x 64"

fields.name: Sage Green Woodland Animal Collection
fields.description:
Gender Neutral Cotton Fabric - Sage Green Woodland Animal Collection Petal Signature Quilting Cotton Mix & Match Fabric by Spoonflower.  Bundle includes 8 x Fat Quarter's of fabric.

FAT QUARTER: 1/4th yard cut of fabric, measuring 18 inches long by half of the width of a yard (varies based on selected fabric)

PETAL SIGNATURE QUILTING COTTON:
- Best for quilting, craft projects, toys and accessories
- 100% natural cotton fabric with a versatile, plain weave
- 4.3 oz per square yard (145 gsm)
- Estimated shrinkage: 2-3% in length and 4-5% in width

fields.name: Beginner's Guide to Free Motion Quilting
fields.author: Beth Burns
fields.description:
Are you tired of hand quilting the same patterns over and over again?

Does "drop the feed dogs" paralyze your brain and cramp your fingers?

Do you always feel a lack of control when doing machine quilting?

Are you sick of wasting fabric, thread, and time on traditional quilting?

If your answer is yes, then this book is for you.

I, Beth Burns, will teach you the secrets of getting started with FMQ pain-free.

Once you 'get it', you won't go back to other types of quilting.

It's like riding a bicycle, once you learn it, you can do it for the rest of your life.

fields.name: The Ultimate Guide to Free-Motion Quilting
fields.author: Angela Walters
fields.description:
Try free-motion quilting––the Angela Walters way. Filled with inspiring photos, practical tips for making your quilting its best, and an extensive design library, this compendium leaves no stone unturned.

Everything Angela Walters: A treasure trove of free-motion quilting techniques and designs, taking you from start to finish.
Includes everything you need to get started, extensive guidance on how to choose and use quilting designs, tips for adjusting designs to your quilt top, and a massive design library!
Angela Walters’ creative philosophies and inspirations buoy these long-celebrated techniques and designs.

fields.name: Free-Motion Combinations
fields.author: Christina Cameli
fields.description: Start free-motion combination quilting and take your projects to the next level with best-selling author Christina Cameli. Perfect for quilters who are comfortable with allover and repeated designs, this comprehensive guide will build upon these simple skills so that quilters have the confidence to combine designs the way professional quilters do.

fields.name: 'Tis the Season for Quilting
fields.author: Annie's Quilting
fields.description: Choose from a variety of different quilt patterns in all different kinds of sizes and layouts. This book is filled with 13 fun holiday designs that bring the magic of Christmas to life. Whether it's for your own home or to give as a gift, choose from a variety of different projects from quilts, cushions, ornaments, table runners, and place mats in all kinds of sizes.

fields.name: Pool Party Fabric: Party Montage, Blue
fields.description:
The price shown for this Pool Party fabric by Makower is per quarter metre. Fabric can be purchased in quarter metre units.
For example, if you wish to order 1 ½ metres enter "6" as the quantity (6 x 1/4m = 1 ½ metres). The fabric will be sent as a single piece.

Fabric width is approximately 42" - 44" (108 - 112cm).

Material: Cotton

fields.name: Pool Party Fabric: Party Montage, White
fields.description:
The price shown for this Pool Party fabric by Makower is per quarter metre. Fabric can be purchased in quarter metre units.
For example, if you wish to order 1 ½ metres enter "6" as the quantity (6 x 1/4m = 1 ½ metres). The fabric will be sent as a single piece.

Fabric width is approximately 42" - 44" (108 - 112cm).

Material: Cotton

fields.name: Posy Fat Quarter Bundle
fields.description:
A selection of 15 prints from the Posy collection by Annabel Wrigley cut to fat quarters. Fabrics are cut to approximately 50 x 55cm
Designed by: Annabel Wrigley.

Material: Cotton.

fields.name: Quilters Dream Cotton Natural Request Crib Batting
fields.description:
Crib size: 45" x 60".

100% cotton batting. Request weight (hand). Natural. Stitch up to 8" apart, no need to prewash.

fields.name: Quilters Dream Cotton Natural Request Twin Batting
fields.description:
Twin size: 92" x 72".

100% cotton batting. Request weight (hand). Natural. Stitch up to 8" apart, no need to prewash.

fields.name: Omnigrid Favourites Patchwork Ruler Set
fields.description:
The Omnigrid® ruler set contains one each of 3 Omnigrid quilting rulers (4” and 6” squares and 1” x 6”) to execute a variety of measurements; the 4” square includes a 1/8” grid for miniatures; the 6” square includes 30º, 45º and 60º angles; the 1” x 6” checks and marks seam allowances.

Use with a rotary cutter or a straight-edge blade.
All of the rulers in this value pack have the following standard Omnigrid features:
Edge markings for accurate measuring.
Laser cut edges for smooth, deep cutting.
Patented double-sight lines that show up on light and dark fabrics.
Heavy-duty durable acrylic material.

fields.name: Olfa 45mm Deluxe Rotary Cutter
fields.description:
Comfortably curved Olfa rotary cutter with double safety mechanism. Uses 45mm blade.

This versatile Olfa cutter will also take the 45mm Wave Blade and Pinking Blade (these can be ordered separately).

A rolling razor blade that's perfect for all of your sewing and quilting needs. Sharp enough to cut through more than 6 layers of fabric, making quick work of your strip, block, and pattern cutting. Comfortable ergonomic handle reduces hand and wrist fatigue, and dual-action safety lock allows the blade to lock open for comfort and closed for safety. Blade is made of high quality tungsten carbide tool steel for unparalleled sharpness and superior edge retention. For right- and left-handed use.

fields.name: Patchwork Animal Baby Boy Quilt
fields.description: This patchwork baby boy quilt with baby animals is made of soft, lightweight cotton fabrics. The fabric is from the Little Things Collection for Riley Blake Designs. Colours include blue, grey, and white. The backing and binding are made with coordinating prints. This quilt is a perfect size for snuggling or stretching out on the floor for play time with your little one. It would make a beautiful accent piece for a little boy's room.

fields.name: Pink Bears Baby Quilt
fields.description:
Handmade baby quilt in pink, green, grey and white.
This applique baby bear’s quilt is made with all cotton fabrics. Warm and white cotton batting and a pink, white and grey flannel for the backing, making the quilt soft and warm to snuggle under.
Machine pieced, and machine quilted, using a variety of free motion quilting designs.
Size approximately length 48.75” x width 42” (124 cms x 107 cms).
The quilt can be washed in cool water and dried on a low setting in the dryer.

fields.name: Handmade Modern Lap Quilt
fields.description:
A soothing blue small lap quilt perfect for all ages in fun Kaffe Fassett Spot fabric. A comfy cotton child's quilt, a baby play mat, a toddler nap blanket or a pretty nursing blanket.

Dimensions: 39 x 43 inches/99 x 109 cm.

This lightweight, warm modern patchwork quilt is handcrafted with a calming blue palette -- fresh blues, whites, rich purple and a splash of apple green spots. The backing fabric has the same calming duck-egg blue as the designed front.

Pieced and lightly machine quilted on a domestic machine by hand in one inch/2.5 cm straight lines. Between the designed front and the backing fabric, the quilt is lined with a soft layer of new, low-loft cotton batting (wadding) to provide warmth and comfort.

Machine wash in cool or warm cycle and tumble dry. Once washed it will have the soft feel and the traditional puckery, slightly puffy look of a much loved antique-style cotton quilt. The quilt will also get softer with use.

fields.name: Handmade Patchwork Lap Quilt
fields.description:
Beautiful, handmade patchwork lap quilt/ throw.

This unique square quilt has been made using Moda 100% cotton fabrics from the pepper and flax collection, in summery yellows, greens, whites and greys.

This lovely quilt is assembled using cotton blend wadding and is backed with 100% cotton quilters calico.

The front of the quilt is assembled with patchwork squares, which have been machine quilted in a straight stitch with a cream Gutermann thread. The squares are then bordered with a grey linen texture fabric and finished with a contrasting patterned binding.

This quilt has many uses. It would be great as a small lap quilt or as a throw on a sofa. It could also be used in the car and taken on summer picnics.

It would also make a special gift which could be passed down through the generations.

Quilt Measurements:

Length 45 inches approx x Width 45 inches approx.

Washing instructions - Please machine wash at 30 degrees and cool iron if required.

fields.name: Handmade Patchwork Single Quilt
fields.description:
This beautiful patchwork quilt is a mixture of beautiful pinks, blues and yellows from the Dena Designs range. It has 100% cotton batting and a white cotton back and is quilted through all three layers in a checkerboard effect.

This quilt measures approx 79" x 52" (200cm x 132cm).

The quilt should be machine washed on a low setting and line dried.

fields.name: Star and Butterfly Double Quilt
fields.description: Absolutely stunning star and butterfly design using the gorgeous Ruby Star Moonglow range of fabrics. The rich fabrics are colourfast and easy to wash. Completely unique and would suit a range of homes from Bohemian and eclectic through to mid century modern. Hand quilted in soft cotton material. Width: 73 inches. Length: 73 inches.

fields.name: Colourful Single Quilt
fields.description:
A gorgeous handmade quilt.

Quilt top uses beautiful Bonnie and Camille for Moda fabric.

Bright and colourful.

Approximately 139 x 190cm.

fields.name: Red and Black King Size Quilt
fields.description:
Handmade quilt in red, white, grey and black, suitable for a double or king size bed.

Handmade unique quilt, embroidered with its name, ‘Flying geese tours ‘ and date made.

It has been made with cotton fabrics, a child friendly wadding and a simple reverse pattern of hand embroidered stars.

Machine washable.

fields.name: Hugs and Kisses King Size Quilt
fields.description:
Very modern quilting pattern. 

All fabrics are high quality quilting cottons, cotton batting, "newspaper" wide seamless cotton on the back.

Will make a unique one of a kind gift!
